attributes.action: increase the national minimum wage for 16-21 year olds to the same rate as 22 years old and over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the minimum wage for ages 22 plus is £5.52 per hour.The minimum wage for 18-21 year olds is £4.60 p/hr and a ridiculous £3.60 p/hr for 16 and 17 year olds.
This is age discrimination. If the employee is doing the same job as an older colleague then they are being discriminated against; show your support for equal rights! The government may argue that younger people should be in further education but this is not always an option for some people and some may struggle to support themselves through education so may need to work alongside studying.This shouldn't mean they should be punished for their age.
